author: Leslie Josephs
title: Southwest Airlines pilots sue Boeing over 737 Max grounding
description: Southwest Airlines pilots sue Boeing over income they said they've lost due to the grounding of the Boeing 737 Max, now entering its eighth month.
content:
Southwest Airlines' pilots filed a suit against Boeing on Monday, saying the aircraft manufacturer misled the airline's labor union about the plane, which has been grounded for nearly seven months after two fatal crashes.
The Southwest Airlines Pilots Associ… [+2082 chars]
